form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS, FS-398

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/10/2023 PLACE DEPARTMENT OF TE San iro, California FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED TATES OF AMERICA MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS DATE OF EXAMINATION APR 15 1968 U S DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE CITY COUNTRY IMMIGRATION & NATURALIZATION SERVICE At the request of the American Consummon A17 211 295 300 NORTH LOS ANGELES STREET NAME AGE SEX LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA 90012 certify that on the above date. examined DAYARAM RANCHHODJI PANCHAL 58 M I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Actinomycosis Granuloma Inguinale Ringworm of scalp Amebiasis Keratoconjunctivitis, infectious Schistosomiasis Blastomycosis Leishmaniasis Syphilis,infectious stage Chancroid Leprosy (Hansen's Disease) Trachoma Favus Lymphogranuloma Venereum Trypanosomiasis Filariasis Mycetoma Tuberculosis (pulmonary or extrapulmonary) Gonorrhea Paragonimiasis Yaws MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPH& Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (21) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class - A, B, or C - diagnosis, and pertinent details*): CLASS e Vitiligo Chest X-ray report Hocative NO EVIDENCE OF ACTIVE INFLAMATORY OR GRANULOMATOUS DISEASE from Dr. Blood serological - VDRL NON REACTIVE from Dr. U. S. Public Health Service Other special report( NOT INDICATED 314 Federal Building San Pedro. California SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR Hery from Dr. TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT M D APR 15 1968 Continue on reverse side/if necessary. FORM FS-398 10-65 DJon
